Love this skirt. It is so versatile, I use as my go-to Ren Faire skirt or pirate dress skirt. (Picture included is my Ren Faire look). Great in heat and mild cold. I like to wear biker shorts under for a little bit more comfort. The front can be pulled up to show more legs, but I like to keep it long. Over all best "costume" skirt I have ever bought. This skirt has great stretch, however, if you are like me and have a belly “pouch” that stretch does not work in our favor. It hugs and conforms around the pouch so all see from the side is  belly pouch then it falls straight from UNder the pouch against your legs. It is NOT flattering. I was able to make it work by wearing da long petticoat under it. The petticoat pooffed up enough hide the pouch and turned the skirt into a two tone ballgown type look.  It what I originally wanted but I had to improvise.
